##Get the data and take a quick look at it

```{r}
data(ToothGrowth)
```



```{r, echo=FALSE}
str(ToothGrowth)
```

```{r "plot"}
require(ggplot2)

ggplot(ToothGrowth, aes(x=dose, y = len))+geom_point(size = 2)+facet_grid(. ~ supp)


```
